monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion
skills.description: 5 x 80% (400%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 100% (500%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Brains over Brawn
skills.description: If this Monster would gain Might (Buff), it gains Sorcery (Buff) instead.

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Channeled Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (400 + 40% Magic + 40% Max Mana) Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Channeling Support
skills.description: Unique Aura: Channel also improves all healing and shielding skills (active and passive) by 15%.

skills.name: Charge Amplifier
skills.description: Aura: All Charge stacks in the party are 33% stronger.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Curse Breaker
skills.description: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Enchantment
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Enchantment Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Enchantment Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Extra Channel
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party gains a non-Channel Buff, 15% chance they also gain Channel.

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Gravity
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Base Damage is increased by 2 x 10% for every health and defense rating of the target

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heat Shimmer
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Ice Hail
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Charging
skills.description: For every 40 Mana regenerated, gain a Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Potential
skills.description: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Master of Time
skills.description: Aura: Ancients and Monsters with Aging start combat with an Age stack.

skills.name: Multi Channel
skills.description: Aura: Channel (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Weakness
skills.description: Neutral damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Outlast
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gain their first, second, or third Age stack, they also gain a shield equal to 15% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Snow Veil
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Solar Blaze
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Solar Rays
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Static Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) also increases non-Critical damage by 15%.

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Void Flare
skills.description: 1 x 140% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Void Flare Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Void Flare Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Void Flare Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

drops.name: Hourglass
drops.description: Health +60 Mana +10 Unique Aura: Age stacks of allied Monsters are 33% more effective.
